name: static-file-loader
description: file-loader that stores a map of original file names to file names with hashes in the compilation stats

scripts.test: npm run lint && env NODE_ENV=test mocha --require ./test/power_assert_loader.js test/basic.js test/integration.js
scripts.test-watch: npm run lint && env NODE_ENV=test mocha --require ./test/power_assert_loader.js test/basic.js test/integration.js --watch
scripts.test-ci: npm run lint && env NODE_ENV=test mocha --require ./test/power_assert_loader.js test/basic.js test/integration.js

author: Sasha Koss <koss@nocorp.me>
